name: After Hours v2
description:
After Hours is a top down, speedrun, puzzle game. In this game, you play as Boomba, a little floor cleaning robot that has to clean the floors in the office after everyone leaves. When everyone is gone, the floor becomes unstable and falls into the void when Boomba drives over it. Your goal is the make all the unstable tiles fall before returning to your charging station at the beginning of each level.

Made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam and updated for DAGD 355.

Controls:

WASD: movement

R: restart

E: ??? (it's a surprise)

ESC or P: Pause menu

Credits:

Caleb Knoth - Artist

Matthew Milostan - Artist

Brennar Schopp - Programmer

Charlotte Raft - Artist
